text.jpText: ねえ、三日月あなたも 迷う時があるの？
text.enText: Hey, Crescent Moon  Are there times when you feel lost too?

text.jpText: 手かざせば今夜も たおやかな光
text.enText:
If I hold up my hand towards the sky tonight 
I can feel your graceful light

text.jpText: 朧げにただ 浮かぶ明かりを
text.enText: Your dim light merely shining overhead

text.jpText: 追いかけて駆けだすの
text.enText: I can't help but chase after its glow

text.jpText: 声にならずに消えた想い
text.enText: Filled with these emotions that disappeared

text.jpText: 私のささやかな祈り今
text.enText: Right now, my smallest of prayers
Has been thrown into the vast sky

text.jpText: いつかあなたのように誰かのことを
text.enText: I only wish someday, I could be someone like you

text.jpText: 照らせる人になりたいだけ

text.enText: No  I won't cry no more
